REAXION GUERRILLA - Revoluxion (demo vr.02) EP (2007)

Artist : Reaxion Guerrilla (Peru)
Album : Revoluxion DEMO vr.02
Genre : Dark Electro Industrial / TBM Techno Body Music
Bitrate : 128 kbs, mp3

"In 2005 Exsubte decided to reinvent ?Reaxion GuerrillA?? (Industrial Experimental Noize band from Lima ?Peru, South America) and with Zero Bits started to work on new songs, the result was terror ebm (hellelektro). Now everything is almost ready to realese there promo cd (out on July 2007) is composed by tracks of EBM elements mixed with screaming vocals. The band is planning the promotion of the CD and searching for a valid offer from a label." (c) Reaxion Guerrilla VampireFreaks
